definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: People survive because they are really good cooperators.
sentences.chinese: 人们进化是因为他们彼此间是最好的合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Want to check to bughouse regularly here.
sentences.chinese: 此间要定期到精神病院复查。

sentences.english: The life can be let I am here is weary unbearable.
sentences.chinese: 生活只能让我在此间疲倦不堪。

sentences.english: Ss become less dependent on the teacher, and get used to helping and learning from each other.
sentences.chinese: 让学生减少对老师的依赖，习惯于彼此间互学互助。

sentences.english: “Like friends, we discuss those differences honestly and forthrightly,” Clinton said at the opening session yesterday of the first day of meetings between U.
sentences.chinese: 我们像朋友一样坦诚直率地探讨彼此间存在的差异。

sentences.english: Such names serve more than fodder for pitting males and females against one another.
sentences.chinese: 起这些名字并非仅是男女性彼此间无意义的一比。

sentences.english: Cannot stand up to the years rolling like a stream, and cannot escape the youth.
sentences.chinese: 经不住似水流年，逃不过此间少年。

sentences.english: Mike and Molly have patched up their differences.
sentences.chinese: 迈克和莫莉已经平息了彼此间的分歧。

sentences.english: In the process, China has become the world s third largest trader.
sentences.chinese: 此间中国攀升为世界第三大贸易国。

sentences.english: Not once had we written to each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们彼此间没有写过一封信。

sentences.english: The silver lining is that many accommodations have remained reasonably priced.
sentences.chinese: 一点慰藉是，此间许多房间住宿还保持着合理价格。

sentences.english: In the course of the RCIA journey, recreational activities are also organized for the building of friendship between participants.
sentences.chinese: 慕道过程中也举办一些康乐活动，促进彼此间的友谊。

sentences.english: The Fifth Cross-Straits Economic, Trade and Culture Forum unveiled its curtain in Changsha on July 11.
sentences.chinese: 第五届两岸经贸文化论坛十一日在此间开幕。

sentences.english: Humanity knows only extremes in karma both with earth and amongst one another.
sentences.chinese: 人类只了解彼此间和与地球间业力中的极端。

sentences.english: Unity is expressed here in terms of sun and sea.
sentences.chinese: 此间的统一便在阳光和海洋里。

sentences.english: Rumour is already rife here as to Dr. Trefoil's successor.
sentences.chinese: 关于特雷福伊尔博士的继任人，此间已经谣言蜂起。
